rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment reports factual actions ('have quarantined', 'will be depopulated') without high-potency verbs or metaphors.
'will be depopulated' is future/plan, not realised impact. 'depopulated' is also a containment verb.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
Reports control measures and a bare negation ('will not enter the food system'), not an explicit calming cue.
No minimiser or scale contrast found.
